parameter.name: accountId
parameter.description: ID of the Canvas admin account to which the course belongs to.

parameter.name: name
parameter.description: The name of the course. If omitted, the course will be named Unnamed Course.

parameter.name: code
parameter.description: The course code for the course.

parameter.name: startAt
parameter.description: Course start date in ISO8601 format, e.g. 2011-01-01T01:00Z

parameter.name: endAt
parameter.description: Course end date in ISO8601 format. e.g. 2011-01-01T01:00Z

parameter.name: license
parameter.description: The name of the licensing used when publishing the course.

parameter.name: isPublic
parameter.description: Whether the course is public or private in Canvas.

parameter.name: publicSyllabus
parameter.description: Set to true to make the course syllabus public.

parameter.name: publicDescription
parameter.description: A publicly visible description of the course.

parameter.name: allowStudentWikiEdits
parameter.description: If true, students will be able to modify the course wiki.

parameter.name: allowWikiComments
parameter.description: If true, course members will be able to comment on wiki pages.

parameter.name: allowStudentForumAttachments
parameter.description: If true, students can attach files to forum posts.

parameter.name: openEnrollment
parameter.description: Set to true if the course is open enrollment.

parameter.name: selfEnrollment
parameter.description: Set to true if the course is self enrollment.

parameter.name: restrictEnrollmentsToCourseDates
parameter.description: Set to true to restrict user enrollments to the start and end dates of the course.

parameter.name: termId
parameter.description: The unique ID of the term to create to course in.

parameter.name: sisCourseId
parameter.description: The unique SIS identifier.

parameter.name: integrationId
parameter.description: The unique Integration identifier.

parameter.name: hideFinalGrades
parameter.description: If this option is set to true, the totals in student grades summary will be hidden.

parameter.name: applyAssignmentGroupWeights
parameter.description: Set to true to weight final grade based on assignment groups percentages.

parameter.name: gradingStandardId
parameter.description: The grading standard id to set for the course. If no value is provided for this argument the current grading_standard will be un-set from this course.

parameter.name: syllabusBody
parameter.description: The syllabus body for the course.

parameter.name: enrollMe
parameter.description: Set to true to enroll the current user as the teacher.

parameter.name: offer
parameter.description: If this option is set to true, the course will be available to students immediately.
